list_definition.definition: physical exercises to make the heart and lungs stronger, often done to music in a class

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: Water aerobics can help you to burn calories.

list_ex_of_english: Aerobics would become a sport if there were some form of judgment involved.
Perhaps we should redefine the nature of sport, when aerobics is considered a sport and line dancing is not.
As such, exercises can be issued in a very similar way to aerobics.
Aerobics have replaced jogging as the "in" way to keep fit.
The current fad for aerobics, for instance, if it is a fad, has moved into a competitive area.
They may be aerobics, choir practice, music, drama, dance, photography, philately, or anything one likes to think of.
One person reported having a thought inserted into her head that she was to be attacked, and consequently she quickly fled the aerobics class she was in.
It is on the basis that the girls do not like it and can get perfectly healthy exercise by taking part in dance or aerobics.
